channel.title: How can i make more lines whit npc talk PLEASE LOOK <-----

item.title: How can i make more lines whit npc talk PLEASE LOOK <-----
item.dc:creator: @smkscape smkscape
item.description:
@smkscape wrote:

So i made this:

if (playerHasItem(441, 200)){ if(NPCID == 243 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) actionInterval = 10000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 10000000); sendFrame200(4883, 243); sendFrame126("Vince".replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("Thanks "+playerName+", come back if you have more!", 4885); sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(243, 4886); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; deleteItem(441, 200); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

But how can i make more lines like this:

if (playerHasItem(441, 200)){ if(NPCID == 243 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval) actionInterval = 10000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); addItem(995, 10000000); sendFrame200(4883, 243); sendFrame126("Vince".replaceAll("_", " "), 4884); sendFrame126("Thanks "+playerName+", come back if you have more!", 4885); SO LIKE HERE------------------ AND HERE------------------ sendFrame126("Click here to continue", 4886); sendFrame75(243, 4886); sendFrame164(4882); NpcDialogueSend = true; deleteItem(441, 200); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

plz help

Read full topic
